additional_info:
Storeroom, Intercom, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, Duplex, Elevator, Generator, Heating system: gas, electricity, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 Tbilisis finest property: phenomenal huge penthouse apartment with fabulous views, all amenities, fully independent power, heating, and water supply, with gorgeous views of the surrounding forests, the snowtopped mountains of the Caucasus, and the entire city. 5 minutes walk from downtown Vake, 15 minutes walk from Turtle Lake! Very quiet, very clean air, beautiful sunlit rooms and an enormous roof terrace where you feel like an eagle perched on the green mountaintop. Spacious apartments, large windows, high ceilings, with concierge, garden, gardener, elevator, lovely bathrooms, marble fireplaces. Flooring and tiling and any other requested finishing details will be installed at short notice to owners specifications. Absolutely fabulous brand new property, you will feel like the King and Queen of Tbilisi living here.
